expel.lib
=========

This is ``expel.lib`` part of the ExPeL library. It provides code to create
a networked xPL device.

Dependencies
------------

``expel.lib`` is dependent on the following Python packages...

*  `Twisted <http://twistedmatrix.com/trac/>`_
*  `ConfigObj <http://pypi.python.org/pypi/configobj>`_
*  expel.message
